question: How easily do you lose focus when working on a task?

options.text: Very easily; I get distracted constantly.
Somewhat easily; I lose focus occasionally.
I can maintain focus for a reasonable amount of time.
I can maintain focus for extended periods.
I have excellent concentration and rarely get distracted.

question: How would you rate your short-term memory?

options.text: Very poor; I often forget things immediately.
Below average; I forget things fairly quickly.
Average; I can remember most things for a short time.
Above average; I have a good short-term memory.
Excellent; I have a very strong short-term memory.

question: How often do you use logic to solve problems?

options.text: Rarely; I usually rely on intuition or guesswork.
Sometimes; I use logic when it seems necessary.
Often; I try to use logical reasoning most of the time.
Frequently; I almost always use logic to approach problems.
Consistently; I rely heavily on logic and analytical thinking.

question: How quickly can you learn and apply new information?

options.text: Very slowly; I struggle to grasp new concepts.
Slowly; it takes me a while to learn new things.
At an average pace; I learn at a typical speed.
Quickly; I can learn new things fairly easily.
Very quickly; I am a fast learner and can apply new information effectively.

question: How well can you concentrate in a noisy environment?

options.text: I cannot concentrate at all in noisy environments.
I find it very difficult to concentrate in noisy environments.
I can concentrate somewhat in noisy environments, but it's challenging.
I can usually concentrate well even with some noise.
I can concentrate effectively even in very noisy environments.

question: How often do you engage in activities that challenge your mind (e.g., puzzles, strategy games)?

options.text: Rarely or never.
Occasionally.
Sometimes.
Often.
Very often; I actively seek out mental challenges.

question: How would you rate your ability to think critically?

options.text: Very low; I struggle to analyze information effectively.
Below average; I sometimes struggle with critical thinking.
Average; I can think critically in most situations.
Above average; I have good critical thinking skills.
Excellent; I am a highly analytical and critical thinker.

question: How well can you recall details from past events?

options.text: Very poorly; I have difficulty remembering past events.
Below average; my recall of past events is not very good.
Average; I can recall some details from past events.
Above average; I have a good memory for past events.
Excellent; I have a very strong memory for past events and details.

question: How easily do you learn new procedures or processes?

options.text: I find it very difficult to learn new procedures.
It takes me a long time to learn new procedures.
I learn new procedures at an average pace.
I learn new procedures quickly.
I learn and adapt to new procedures very quickly and efficiently.

options.text: Rarely or never.
Occasionally.
Sometimes.
Often.
Very often; I regularly engage in self-reflection.

options.text: I find it very difficult to understand complex information.

I can analyze complex information with some effort.
I can analyze complex information fairly well.
I am highly skilled at analyzing complex information and identifying key insights.

question: How easily can you switch between different tasks?

options.text: I find it very difficult to switch between tasks and lose my train of thought.

I can switch between tasks fairly easily.
I am very good at multitasking and switching between tasks efficiently.

options.text: Very poor; I struggle to find solutions to problems.

Above average; I am a good problem solver.
Excellent; I am a highly effective and creative problem solver.

options.text: Rarely or never.

options.text: Very poorly; I have a hard time remembering both names and faces.

Average; I can remember some names and faces.
Above average; I have a good memory for names and faces.

options.text: I find it very difficult to adapt to unexpected changes.
It takes me a while to adjust to unexpected changes.

options.text: Rarely or never.

Sometimes, in everyday situations.

Above average; I am comfortable with abstract thinking.

I can generally manage mental pressure and stress.
I perform well under pressure and can stay focused.

Often, I use visualization to enhance my focus and memory.

I sometimes struggle to see connections between things.
I can identify some patterns and connections.
I am good at identifying patterns and making connections.
I am highly skilled at identifying complex patterns and connections, even in seemingly disparate information.

options.text: Very low; I cannot concentrate for very long at all.

Above average; I have a good concentration span.

options.text: Rarely or never.
Occasionally.
Sometimes.
Often.

options.text: I am easily overwhelmed by irrelevant information and struggle to focus.

I am good at filtering out irrelevant information and staying focused on the task at hand.

options.text: Very low; I struggle to think clearly under pressure.

Excellent; I am highly effective at thinking logically and rationally, even under intense pressure.

Very often; I am consistently working to enhance my cognitive abilities through various techniques and practices.

Excellent; I have a very strong working memory and can easily juggle multiple pieces of information.
